PropertyDef.name: sdxyj
PropertyDef.Property: 手动协议价(手动输入货品价格)

PropertyDef.name: overduePayCompNo
PropertyDef.Property: 超期费用付款单位编号

PropertyDef.name: overduePayCompNo
PropertyDef.Property: 超期费用付款单位编号

PropertyDef.name: settleType
PropertyDef.Property: 结算方式(1日结2月结3自定义日期)

PropertyDef.name: status
PropertyDef.Property: 状态(1是否已提交2是否确认付款3是否已结案)

PropertyDef.name: jsdr
PropertyDef.Property: 结算导入标示(已导=1，否则=0)

PropertyDef.name: status
PropertyDef.Property: 状态(1确认配货2接受确认3打印六联单)

PropertyDef.name: ifImport
PropertyDef.Property: 是否导入(A转库入库B货权转授)

PropertyDef.name: settleType
PropertyDef.Property: 结算方式(1日结2月结3自定义日期)

PropertyDef.name: status
PropertyDef.Property: 状态(1是否已提交2是否确认付款3是否已结案)

DateDropDown.ClientEvent: var date = new Date(arg.selectedValue ); arg.selectedValue = date.formatDate ("Ymd H:m:s");
